title: cdm_reader_mapper: Common Data Model reader and mapper toolbox
description:
The cdm_reader_mapper toolbox is a python tool designed for both reading data files compliant with a user specified data model and mapping observed variables and their associated metadata from a data model or models combination to the C3S CDS Common data model format.  
 
cdm_reader_mapper development is funded through Copernicus Climate Change Service. 
Furthermore, acknowledgments go to National Oceanography Centre and UK Marine and Climate Advisory Service.
